00102 template <typename IndexType, typename ValueType, class MemorySpace>
00103 class dia_matrix : public detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::dia_format>
00104 {
00105   typedef cusp::detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::dia_format> Parent;
00106   public:
00107     // TODO statically assert is_signed<IndexType>
00108     
00111     template<typename MemorySpace2>
00112     struct rebind { typedef cusp::dia_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace2> type; };
00113 
00116     typedef typename cusp::array1d<IndexType, MemorySpace>                     diagonal_offsets_array_type;
00117     
00120     typedef typename cusp::array2d<ValueType, MemorySpace, cusp::column_major> values_array_type;
00121 
00124     typedef typename cusp::dia_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> container;
00125 
00128     typedef typename cusp::dia_matrix_view<typename diagonal_offsets_array_type::view,
00129                                            typename values_array_type::view,
00130                                            IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> view;
00131     
00134     typedef typename cusp::dia_matrix_view<typename diagonal_offsets_array_type::const_view,
00135                                            typename values_array_type::const_view,
00136                                            IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> const_view;
00137 
00140     diagonal_offsets_array_type diagonal_offsets;
00141     
00144     values_array_type values;
00145         
00148     dia_matrix() {}
00149 
00159     dia_matrix(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries,
00160                size_t num_diagonals, size_t alignment = 32)
00161       : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries),
00162         diagonal_offsets(num_diagonals)
00163       {
00164         // TODO use array2d constructor when it can accept pitch
00165         values.resize(num_rows, num_diagonals, detail::round_up(num_rows, alignment));
00166       }
00167     
00172     template <typename MatrixType>
00173     dia_matrix(const MatrixType& matrix);
00174     
00177     void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries,
00178                 size_t num_diagonals)
00179     {
00180       Parent::resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries);
00181       diagonal_offsets.resize(num_diagonals);
00182       values.resize(num_rows, num_diagonals);
00183     }
00184                
00187     void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries,
00188                 size_t num_diagonals, size_t alignment)
00189     {
00190       Parent::resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries);
00191       diagonal_offsets.resize(num_diagonals);
00192       values.resize(num_rows, num_diagonals, detail::round_up(num_rows, alignment));
00193     }
00194     
00199     void swap(dia_matrix& matrix)
00200     {
00201       Parent::swap(matrix);
00202       diagonal_offsets.swap(matrix.diagonal_offsets);
00203       values.swap(matrix.values);
00204     }
00205     
00210     template <typename MatrixType>
00211     dia_matrix& operator=(const MatrixType& matrix);
00212 }; // class dia_matrix
00230 template <typename Array1,
00231           typename Array2,
00232           typename IndexType   = typename Array1::value_type,
00233           typename ValueType   = typename Array2::value_type,
00234           typename MemorySpace = typename cusp::minimum_space<typename Array1::memory_space, typename Array2::memory_space>::type >
00235 class dia_matrix_view : public detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::dia_format>
00236 {
00237   typedef cusp::detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::dia_format> Parent;
00238   public:
00241     typedef Array1 diagonal_offsets_array_type;
00242     
00245     typedef Array2 values_array_type;
00246 
00249     typedef typename cusp::dia_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> container;
00250 
00253     typedef typename cusp::dia_matrix_view<Array1, Array2, IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> view;
00254 
00257     diagonal_offsets_array_type diagonal_offsets;
00258 
00261     values_array_type values;
00262 
00265     dia_matrix_view() {}
00266 
00267     template <typename OtherArray1, typename OtherArray2>
00268     dia_matrix_view(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries,
00269                     OtherArray1& diagonal_offsets, OtherArray2& values)
00270     : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries), diagonal_offsets(diagonal_offsets), values(values) {}
00271 
00272     template <typename OtherArray1, typename OtherArray2>
00273     dia_matrix_view(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries,
00274                     const OtherArray1& diagonal_offsets, const OtherArray2& values)
00275     : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries), diagonal_offsets(diagonal_offsets), values(values) {}
00276     
00277     template <typename Matrix>
00278     dia_matrix_view(Matrix& A)
00279     : Parent(A), diagonal_offsets(A.diagonal_offsets), values(A.values) {}
00280     
00281     template <typename Matrix>
00282     dia_matrix_view(const Matrix& A)
00283     : Parent(A), diagonal_offsets(A.diagonal_offsets), values(A.values) {}
00284     
00287     void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries,
00288                 size_t num_diagonals)
00289     {
00290       Parent::resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries);
00291       diagonal_offsets.resize(num_diagonals);
00292       values.resize(num_rows, num_diagonals);
00293     }
00294                
00297     void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries,
00298                 size_t num_diagonals, size_t alignment)
00299     {
00300       Parent::resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries);
00301       diagonal_offsets.resize(num_diagonals);
00302       values.resize(num_rows, num_diagonals, detail::round_up(num_rows, alignment));
00303     }
00304 }; // class dia_matrix_view
